original_text:
Mystic Fortune Deluxe
In questa bella slot targata Habanero, ci troviamo immersi in Cina, in un luogo incantato che ispira serenità e relax.
Lo sfondo del gioco è infatti un giardino rigoglioso con tanto di cascata e ponticello di legno che attraversa il fiume e ci porta verso l’entrata di un tempio maestoso.
Dal punto di vista grafico, Mystic Fortune Deluxe è un vero e proprio gioiellino, con i simboli molto nitidi, ricchi di dettagli e dai colori accesi. Sulla consolle sono riportate le statistiche delle puntate e troviamo anche le opzioni per settare al meglio la nostra scommessa.
Anche il comparto musicale contribuisce ad arricchire l’esperienza di gioco, con un motivo dalle atmosfere zen che ci aiuta e entrare ancor di più nel mood del gioco.
Caratteristiche della slot
In Mystic Fortune Deluxe abbiamo 28 linee fisse che si dipanano su una griglia con 5 rulli e 4 righe. La scommessa su ogni linea parte da un minimo di 0,01 €, quindi per ogni spin dovremo spendere almeno 0,28 €. Parte di ogni puntata va a finire nel jackpot segnalato sulla parte alta della schermata.
La volatilità è media, mentre il valore RTP è pari al 96,71.
Simboli e funzionalità
I simboli base sono 9, con le carte da gioco che pagano meno di tutti. Per avere vincite più consistenti meglio puntare allora sui simboli di alto livello. La sfera, la coppa, il dragone e la moneta d’oro ci assicurano un bel gruzzoletto.
La ragazza è il simbolo Wild, sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter e può apparire soltanto sui rulli 1, 3 e 5. Si tratta di un Wild esteso, ciò vuol dire che ogni volta che apparirà andrà a riempire il rullo verso l’alto e/o il basso e assicurarci un maggior numero di combinazioni vincenti.
L’araba fenice è il nostro Scatter. Oltre a essere pagante, quando atterra sui rulli ci ricompensa con un numero di giri gratuiti compresi tra 8 e 288.
A regalare free spin è anche il simbolo Wild. Sono 28 e per averli dovremo vederlo comparire contemporaneamente nei tre rulli sopra menzionati.
I free spin attivati dallo Scatter regalano un moltiplicatore x2, quelli attivati dal Wild, x5.
Se vediamo comparire il fiore di loto, vedremo applicato un moltiplicatore compreso tra x2 e x8888!

raw_translation.response:
Mystic Fortune Deluxe
In this beautiful slot game by Habanero, we find ourselves immersed in a mystical land of China that inspires serenity and relaxation. The game's background is a lush garden complete with a waterfall and a wooden bridge that crosses a river leading us towards the entrance of a majestic temple. Mystic Fortune Deluxe is truly a masterpiece that boasts sharp and detailed symbols in bright colors. On the console, statistics of bets are displayed, and options are available to optimize our wagers. The musical accompaniment enhances the gaming experience, featuring a Zen-inspired melody that further immerses us in the game's mood.

Game Features
In Mystic Fortune Deluxe, we have 28 fixed pay lines on a grid with 5 reels and 4 rows. Betting on each line starts at a minimum of €0.01, so each spin requires a minimum bet of €0.28. A percentage of each bet contributes to the jackpot displayed on the top part of the screen. The game has medium volatility, and the RTP value is 96.71%.

Symbols and Functions
There are nine base symbols, with playing cards paying the lowest, better off focusing on the higher-level symbols to make big wins. The sphere, the cup, the dragon, and the gold coin ensure a significant payout. The girl is the Wild symbol, replacing all symbols except the Scatter, appearing only on reels 1, 3, and 5. This is an extended Wild, which means that each time it appears, it will fill the reel upward and/or downward, providing more winning combinations.

The Phoenix is our Scatter symbol. Beyond being a payout, when it lands on reels, it rewards us with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 288. Free spins can also be triggered by the Wild symbol. There are 28, and to activate them, we must see it appear simultaneously on the abovementioned three reels. Free spins activated by the Scatter provide a x2 multiplier, and those activated by the Wild provide a x5 multiplier. Seeing the Lotus flower appear means a multiplier ranging from x2 to x8888!

response.headline: Gameplay and Features
response.content: Mystic Fortune Deluxe is a slot game with 28 fixed paylines, 5 reels, and 4 rows. The game has medium volatility and an RTP of 96.71. The minimum betting amount per line is €0.01, making the minimum cost of each spin €0.28. The game features a beautiful Chinese-inspired backdrop with vibrant and crisp symbols. The extended Wild symbol, represented by a girl icon, fills the reel upwards or downwards and guarantees a higher number of winning combinations. The Scatter symbol, represented by a phoenix, rewards players with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 288.  Players can also trigger additional free spins by landing 28 Wild symbols simultaneously.

response.content: Mystic Fortune Deluxe is set in a serene Chinese-inspired garden, complete with a waterfall and a wooden bridge leading to a temple entrance. The game's symbols are rich in detail and feature bright and vibrant colors. The music adds to the gameplay experience, creating a zen atmosphere that immerses players in the game's vibe.

response.headline: Paytable and RTP
response.content: Mystic Fortune Deluxe offers a maximum payout of €1,000 per line and has an RTP of 96.71. There are 9 basic symbols, with playing cards offering the lowest payouts. To increase your rewards, aim for the high-level symbols such as the sphere, cup, dragon, and gold coin. The extended Wild symbol, represented by a girl icon, can replace all symbols except for the Scatter and appears only on reels 1, 3, and 5. The lotus flower symbol can provide a multiplier ranging from x2 to x8888.

response.content: Mystic Fortune Deluxe has medium volatility and a 96.71% RTP. The minimum betting amount per line is €0.01, and the minimum cost of each spin is €0.28. The game's payout frequency is moderate, meaning players will experience a mix of small and moderate wins through the gameplay.

response.headline: Free Spins and Multipliers
response.content: The Scatter symbol, represented by a phoenix, rewards players with free spins ranging from 8 to 288. The extended Wild symbol can also trigger free spins when 28 of them simultaneously appear on the reels. The Scatter free spins come with a x2 multiplier, while the Wild free spins come with a x5 multiplier. Additionally, the lotus flower symbol can provide a multiplier ranging from x2 to x8888.

The phoenix is our Scatter symbol. In addition to being a paying symbol, landing this symbol on the reels will reward you with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 288. The Wild symbol also gives you free spins. There are 28 of these, and you’ll need to see them appear simultaneously on the three reels mentioned above. The free spins activated by the Scatter have a x2 multiplier, while those activated by the Wild have a x5 multiplier. Finally, if you see the lotus flower appear, you’ll see a multiplier applied between x2 and x8888!

Review:
 
Gameplay and Features

Mystic Fortune Deluxe is a slot game with 28 fixed paylines, 5 reels, and 4 rows. The game has medium volatility and an RTP of 96.71. The minimum betting amount per line is €0.01, making the minimum cost of each spin €0.28. The game features a beautiful Chinese-inspired backdrop with vibrant and crisp symbols. The Scatter symbol, represented by a phoenix, rewards players with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 288.  Players can also trigger additional free spins by landing 28 Wild symbols simultaneously.

Visual Design and Themes

Mystic Fortune Deluxe is set in a serene Chinese-inspired garden, complete with a waterfall and a wooden bridge leading to a temple entrance. The game's symbols are rich in detail and feature bright and vibrant colors. The music adds to the gameplay experience, creating a zen atmosphere that immerses players in the game's vibe.

Mystic Fortune Deluxe offers a maximum payout of €1,000 per line and has an RTP of 96.71. There are 9 basic symbols, with playing cards offering the lowest payouts. To increase your rewards, aim for the high-level symbols such as the sphere, cup, dragon, and gold coin. The extended Wild symbol, represented by a girl icon, can replace all symbols except for the Scatter and appears only on reels 1, 3, and 5. The lotus flower symbol can provide a multiplier ranging from x2 to x8888.

Volatility and Payout Frequency

Mystic Fortune Deluxe has medium volatility and a 96.71% RTP. The minimum betting amount per line is €0.01, and the minimum cost of each spin is €0.28. The game's payout frequency is moderate, meaning players will experience a mix of small and moderate wins through the gameplay.

Free Spins and Multipliers

The Scatter symbol, represented by a phoenix, rewards players with free spins ranging from 8 to 288. The extended Wild symbol can also trigger free spins when 28 of them simultaneously appear on the reels. The Scatter free spins come with a x2 multiplier, while the Wild free spins come with a x5 multiplier. Additionally, the lotus flower symbol can provide a multiplier ranging from x2 to x8888.

The phoenix is our Scatter symbol. In addition to being a paying symbol, landing this symbol on the reels will reward you with a number of free spins ranging from 8 to 288. The Wild symbol also gives you free spins. There are 28 of these, and you’ll need to see them appear simultaneously on the three reels mentioned above. The free spins activated by the Scatter have a x2 multiplier, while those activated by the Wild have a x5 multiplier. Finally, if you see the lotus flower appear, you’ll see a multiplier applied between x2 and x8888!
